L

Leaf - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
This is the abstract super class of all the nodes in a graph scene manager that contain an element that needs to be drawn.

Instantiates a new leaf.
Light - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
This class stores the general properties of a light source.
Light() - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Light
Instantiates a new light with standard parameters.
Light.Type - Enum in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Enumeration of the different types of light sources.
lightIterator() - Method in class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.AbstractSceneManager
 
lightIterator() - Method in interface ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces.SceneManagerInterface
Creates an iterator that contains all the lights in the scene, since they need to be accessed differently.
load(String, String) - Method in class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.GLShader
 
load() - Method in class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.GLTexture
This needs to be called from the renderer only.
load(String, String) - Method in interface ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces.Shader
Loads a shader into OpenGL. uses the vertex and fragment shader source code to pass to OpenGL where the actual shader is created.
load() - Method in interface ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces.Texture
Loads the image from the Android resources and passes it to OpenGL as a texture.
